title: Bonus: Glitter's Connection To Forensic Science
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Get ready for some extra sparkle on the heels of last week’s deep dive into “The Great Glitter Mystery.” Retired Forensic Scientist Ed Jones has one of the world’s largest glitter collections. And his side hobby has served him well over the years – glitter helped him solve a murder case back in 2001.
itunes:author: WBUR
